GTYPES.item: ** RCV_NO_BUD TYPE ZRCV_NOB, " INT2 5 0 No.of Bundle

NETPR TYPE BPREI, "Net Price in Purchasing Document (CUR)

GCODING.item: * KNUMV FROM EKKO INTO WA_EKKO WHERE EBELN = WA_ZINW_T_HDR-EBELN.

READ TABLE it_ekko INTO wa_ekko INDEX 1.
